title: The New councillor
creator_contributor_role: Crown Film Unit Production, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Great Britain - Politics and government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Local government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Local government - Great Britain
description: Through the experiences of Richards, a newly elected borough councillor, shows the varied activities of a typical councillor - the people's relationship both with the people who elected him and the permanent officials who carry out the policy laid down by the council.
